statements: SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, follower_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, engagement_rate, influencer_id FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 10000 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY influencer_id ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate IS NOT NULL;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY influencer_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_influencers, AVG(follower_count) AS avg_followers FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate <= 0.1;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE category = 'Fashion';
SELECT id, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT name, shares FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE category = 'Fashion' OR category = 'Beauty'

SELECT name, likes, comments, shares FROM influencer_profiles JOIN engagement_metrics ON influencer_profiles.id = engagement_metrics.influencer_id WHERE likes > 500 AND comments > 100 ORDER BY shares ASC
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY id
SELECT name, followers_count, category FROM influencer_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_date, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT id, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'like' AND engagement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_date, p.likes, e.engagement_type FROM posts p JOIN engagements e ON p.post_id = e.post_id WHERE e.engagement_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY e.engagement_date DESC;
SELECT i.name, COUNT(e.engagement_id) AS total_engagements FROM influencers i JOIN engagements e ON i.id = e.influencer_id GROUP BY i.name ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;
SELECT i.name, COUNT(p.post_id) AS total_posts, SUM(p.likes) AS total_likes FROM influencers i LEFT JOIN posts p ON i.id = p.influencer_id GROUP BY i.name ORDER BY total_posts DESC, total_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 10000
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_profiles ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate >= 5.0
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_id, budget, status FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE budget < 5000
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND comments < 50
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_profiles WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(comments) AS total_comments FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY influencer_id
SELECT i.*, c.* FROM influencer_profiles i JOIN influencer_campaigns ic ON i.influencer_id = ic.influencer_id JOIN campaign_profiles c ON ic.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE ic.budget > 5000
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands;
SELECT influencer_id, likes_count, comments_count FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_id FROM influencer_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
